snippet.title: Superbrothers: Sword & Sworcery now on Nintendo Switch!
snippet.description:
The olde fashioned cult classic cosmic adventure Superbrothers: Sword & Sworcery EP aka S:S&S EP is out now on Nintendo Switch eShop.

Wander in the woods, solve strange puzzles & occasionally battle beasties as you seek to re-unite The Trigon Trifecta and complete The Scythian's woeful errand in this famicom fever dream. Conceived of as 'a record you can hang out in' S:S&S EP is built upon the moods of the moon as well as composer Jim Guthrie's mythic musical score.

Enjoy the sights and sounds of the foothills of Mingi Taw on that lovely Switch screen with your headphones on where you can touch, tap and swipe like in times of old. Alternately let S:S&S EP's distinctive A/V style loose on your television and sound system where you have the option of using a joycon as a pointer, or else guide The Scythian's motions with joysticks & buttons.

Additional details via Nintendo: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/superbrothers-sword-and-sworcery-ep-switch

Additional project info: http://www.swordandsworcery.com
